attributes.action: address and reverse the inequality in prize monies that he and Tessa Jowell have actively encouraged.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The PM and Tessa Jowell joined the Lawn Tennis Association and the Women's Tennis Association in encouraging total inequality in prize monies for the Wimbledon Tennis Tournament. Women players are now to be awarded the same financial rewards as the men for only 3/5ths of the work. This is an inequality which potentially sets a serious precendent and needs addressing urgently
